title: Corporate Innovation Forum
description: B Capital, InnoLead, Prudential and SVB are hosting a Corporate Innovation Forum in Hudson Yards. Weâ€™re bringing together corporate innovators across industries for an afternoon of curated connections, light bites, and small roundtable discussions around focused topics. You can expect thoughtful discussions with senior leaders on topics like: - Key learnings from AI pilots - Scouting and pilot testing emerging tech beyond AI - Dynamics surrounding corporate VC and startup engagement in 2025 - Building strong relationships between innovation and the rest of the organization - Dynamics surrounding corporate accelerators & venture incubation This event is geared to senior professionals working in large organizations. This event is a part of #TechWeek - a week of events hosted by VCs and startups to bring together the tech ecosystem.
